Question
========

A diagnostic tool for the rare tropical disease Waldorps Black Fever (WBF) has sensitivity 0.90 and specificity 0.80. The probability of a traveler contracting the disease is 0.01. What is the probability that someone who the instrument says has the disease actually has WBF leads?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.04
* 0.14
* 0.24

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.04: Correct
* 0.14: Incorrect
* 0.24: Incorrect
